TopicTitle: Rob and Dan Sunday Night Space Flight!

Articles.Content:
We at The Rob and Dan Show love our space, and even more our science! KSP combines all those wonderful things, and that's why we're including it in our weekly event called SUNDAY NIGHT SPACE FLIGHT! Every Sunday starting around 7pm EST, we'll get our space on with Kerbal Space Program, Space Engineers, and even a little FTL. You can find all of this over at http://www.twitch.tv/therobanddanshow

Sometimes we get the itch to get back out into space during the week though, so make sure you click the link to our Twitch page and give our channel a FOLLOW so you can be updated whenever we go live, which happens prettymuch every single day, and many times that's gonna be with Kerbal Space Program!
